status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

fields.summary: LLAP: make sure IO elevator is enabled by default in the daemons

comments.body: [~hagleitn] [~vikram.dixit] -can you take a look- -actually, nm, this will not do what is needed- ok, now it's ready
Enabling io by default has to be done carefully. It would enable IO outside of the daemon. Hence this JIRA

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12793433/HIVE-13283.patch

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to no test(s) being added or modified.

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to 416 failed/errored test(s), 9829 tests executed
*Failed tests:*
{noformat}
TestSparkCliDriver-groupby3_map.q-sample2.q-auto_join14.q-and-12-more - did not produce a TEST-*.xml file

ATTACHMENT ID: 12794819 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build
Committed to master. Thanks for the review!

Doc note:  This changes the default value of *hive.llap.io.enabled* from false to null, so it will have to be documented in Configuration Properties for release 2.1.0.

But first, Configuration Properties needs a new section for llap configs (see HIVE-12078 and HIVE-11908).
